titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (HOME) - Description

body.p: CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (HOME) is the same as attribute COMMUNICATION CONTACT STRING where the COMMUNICATION CONTACT METHOD is National Code 'UK Telephone Number'.
CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (HOME) is the home telephone number for a PERSON .
For the Inter-Provider Transfer Administrative Minimum Data Set , CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (HOME) is the home telephone number for a PERSON who is the designated contact.
